text:
@realDonaldTrump 🙏
Please concentrate on covid19,  south China Sea..... help HongKong and Taiwan be as free state
and Tibbet to be free state..... 

China have not courage to fight from India and Indian.... Don't worry
We will tackle it easily by our Brilliant prime minister Mr Narendra Modi.
